title: Number of dogs in the European Union 2018 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of dogs in thousands for 24 number of Countrys.
The Number of dogs in thousands is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Estonia.
The highest value at Country Germany is 44.76x times more than the lowest value at Estonia.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of dogs in thousands for 24 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of dogs in thousands 9400.0 is found at Country Germany and the minimum is found at Estonia where Country is 210.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of dogs in thousands for 24 number of Countrys.
The Number of dogs in thousands is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Estonia.
The highest value at Country Germany is 44.76x times more than the lowest value at Estonia.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of dogs in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of dogs in thousands is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Estonia.
Second maximum Number of dogs in thousands is found at Country United Kingdom.
The Number of dogs in thousands of Country Estonia is 44.76% smaller than the maximum value at Germany.
The Country Germany has the highest Number of dogs in thousands, followed by United Kingdom, and Poland. Down to the Country Estonia which is the lowest.
The Country Estonia tends to be 3.44 percent lower than average.
